So I have a few landed crafts on minmus and while the engines are deactivated and they are not currently thrusting at all they are animated as being stuck on full thrust like so:

![Xs7E1UQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/Xs7E1UQ.png)

Is there something I can edit in the save file that controls the animation? I have tried lifting off and then cutting the thrust again and it hasn't helped at all. Its with both karbonite engines and the stock small engine as shown in the picture. It really doesn't effect anything other than it pulling unneeded power to render from my gpu and annoying me but I would love to get it fixed.
Are you using real fuels alongside another engine pack? I has a similar problem except my issue was no flame animation?
